name: Bomb Dodger
description:
I suggest Downloading this game as its buggy inside the browser

Bomb Dodger is a game where you have to avoid/destroy bombs whyle trieing to disable all 4 seals.

Only when all 4 seals are disabled at the same time can you escape this nightmare.

The lower the boss is on health the slower he will move around and fix the seals.
By disabling the seals he will lose some protective walls allowing you to damage him.

If a seal has never been broken before it will protect some of the boss his HP (so a higher minimum speed will be maintained). Try to break all 4 seals atleast once to get the boss to his lowest moving speed.

Still gonna make the 3D models for the boss and 3 hero's
(2 Hero's are done but havent been imported yet)
